text: Zai na ri, nannu wei xinzhe [zhu] jiang dui xinshimen shuo:“Qing nimen deng deng women! Rang women zhan yidian er nimen de guanghui ba!” You hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen huiqu xunqiu guanghui ba!” Yushi, tamen [xinshi yu wei xinzhe] zhi jian mashang shu qile yi du qiang, qiang shang you daomen, men nei you enhui, men wai you xingfa.
